body:
Comment 1: 
When you say "emacs 21", do you mean GNU Emacs or XEmacs?

If you mean GNU Emacs, I see no reason to even attempt to support it. It's old and
missing a lot of things. The minimum required version of GNU Emacs is 23.

If you mean XEmacs: The minimum required version is 21.5.32 (one of the recent betas).
There are a number of functions we use that have been added around that version, not
just \s
